IMP

Anxiety

PLAN:
Given rec. for Caltrate 600+D to take bid.
Rx Benicar, ARB covered by free care.
Lipitor rx.
She agrees to resume furosemide, if can skip it on days she goes out, rx to RHC.
F/U 1-2 mo, BP, breast check, order abd/pelvic CT surveillance s/p renal ca, f/u labs.
She declines colo, despite stated risk of colon ca w/ polyps, but might consider it later.
She is advised to stop the asa 10 days prior to any surgery.
